title: Deno Lock file
description:
A lockfile that stores the hashes of all dependencies in a project to ensure integrity.

See https://deno.land/manual@v1.28.2/basics/modules/integrity_checking in the Deno documentation for more information.

additionalProperties.description: The hash as the value for the remote URL as the key.

remote.description: A map of remote URLs to their respective hashes.

additionalProperties.description: The hash as the value for the remote URL as the key.
The redirected specifier as the key and the destination as the value.

packages.description: Integrity data for package-managed modules imported under custom schemes.

specifiers.description: A map of (usually) shortened package specifiers to their full specifier.

additionalProperties.description: The full specifier as the value for the shortened specifier as the key.

jsr.description: Mapping between resolved jsr specifiers and their associated info.

additionalProperties.description: Info associated with a jsr module.

npm.description: A map of npm package names and versions to their respective hashes.

additionalProperties.description: The npm package name to information about hashes about itself and dependencies

integrity.description: The hash of the npm package itself as well as the name of the hash.

dependencies.description: A map of npm package names to the version and name of the package

additionalProperties.description: The package name as the key to the package name + version as the value.
